page.title: 05A DAY IN THE LIFE OF ......
page.content: My name is Alastair and on a typical day I will rise at 07:00 to find a cup of tea at my bedside.When I get up I may play on my computer before having breakfast;toast,cereal and coffee. School starts at 09:00 and finishes at 15:20.During that time we work at Maths,English and Environmental studies among other things. On returning home I either work on my computer or I watch television. On Monday evenings I go to badminton club where we play each other and occasionally we have tournaments.On Tuesday evenings I go to swimming club where we swim,dive and race each other. Other evenings are mainly spent golfing,computing and playing tennis. At night as 21:30 is approaching,so is bedtime.
